title: Tarot:  Witch of the Black Rose vol 1
description: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose is a supernatural adventure set in the present time and is filled with the shadowy world of dark and light magick.Aided by a winged black cat (her familiar, Pooka) and an enchanted sword, the voluptuous warrior witch, Tarot, battles for harmony against the forces of prejudice and darkness.The fate of mankind lies in the hands of one witch.So you better believe in Magick!A respectful incorporation of the Wiccan Tradition, this trade paperback will be enjoyed by practicing witches and lovers of fantasy adventure alike.INTENDED FOR MATURE READERS.
author: Jim Balent
